alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Walton, southwestern Holmes and northwestern Washington Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Prosperity, Arrant Settlement, Rock Hill, Eucheeanna, Five Points, Center Ridge, Knox Hill and Hickory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
